basic.floral_language:
Ipomoea indica
Floriography: prudent, intellect, love
Ipomoea indica are short plants with small trumpet-shaped flowers of many colors, single-petal or multi-petal. Flowering season is long, leaves green, oval. Can be widely used in flower beds or arranged landscapes, window decorations, home decoration and so on, very popular.
Ipomoea indica is a long-day plant, likes sunshine, shade properly in summer noon, blooms from April to October for 3-4 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-October, viewing period 3-4 weeks
basic.color: Flower color red, pink, purple, or in mixture

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Long-day plant, put in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, water daily in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and summer
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
